titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the MC 5 live [videorecording] : kick out the jams / a film by Leni Sinclair and Cary Loren ; music by the MC5.

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: MC 5 live [videorecording] : kick out the jams / a film by Leni Sinclair and Cary Loren ; music by the MC5.

odd.head: Publication, Distribution, Etc.
odd.p: Oaks, PA : Music Video Distributors, [2005], c1999.

odd.head: Varying Form of Title

odd.head: General Note
odd.p: Special feature: John Sinclair interview "live at Crazy Jim's, 11/19/03" ca. 20 min.
